entries.meaning: A formal gown to be worn by women to balls and similar social events.

verbs.description: ballgown (third-person singular simple present ballgowns, present participle ballgowning, simple past and past participle ballgowned)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, UK, live action role-playing games) To roleplay romance as part of a roleplaying game.
examples: She'll take any excuse to ballgown!
